attributes.action: Only give MP's a payrise at the "official" rate of inflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If MP's are dissatisfied with their pay, please allow them to leave and find more lucrative positions in the private sector. Wonder how many would leave? I would guess at none, the main reason being that the private sector pay for results and the majority of MP's would be out of work within 3 months due to incompetence and/or corruption.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
